blocks.name: onomeneq
blocks.content: An ordinal number equinumerous to a natural number is equal to it. Proposition 10.22 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 90 and its converse. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jul-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm onomeneq(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com)), wb(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wceq(c0, c1)))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com)), wbr(c0, cen, c1), wceq(c0, c1))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com)), wbr(c0, cen, c1), wceq(c0, c1))
  sylancom(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com)), wbr(c0, cen, c1), wceq(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)))
  jca(wa(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com)), wbr(c0, cen, c1)), wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com)), wbr(c0, cen, c1)), wcel(c0, com), wn(wss(com, c0)))
  mtod(wa(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com)), wbr(c0, cen, c1)), wss(com, c0), wbr(c0, cen, csuc(c1)))
  mtbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com)), wbr(c0, cen, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, csuc(c1)), wbr(c1, cen, csuc(c1)))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com), wbr(c0, cen, c1), wn(wbr(c1, cen, csuc(c1))))
  php5(c1)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com)), wbr(c0, cen, c1), wb(wbr(c0, cen, csuc(c1)), wbr(c1, cen, csuc(c1))))
  enen1(c0, c1, csuc(c1))
  syl6(wa(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com)), wbr(c0, cen, c1)), wss(com, c0), wbr(c0, cen, csuc(c1)), wa(wbr(c0, cdom, csuc(c1)), wbr(csuc(c1), cdom, c0)))
  jcad(wa(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com)), wbr(c0, cen, c1)), wss(com, c0), wbr(c0, cdom, csuc(c1)), wbr(csuc(c1), cdom, c0))
  adantll(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com), wbr(c0, cen, c1), wi(wss(com, c0), wbr(c0, cdom, csuc(c1))))
  a1d(wa(wcel(c1, com), wbr(c0, cen, c1)), wss(com, c0), wbr(c0, cdom, csuc(c1)))
  ancoms(wcel(c1, com), wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(c0, cdom, csuc(c1)))
  sylan2(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, com), wbr(c0, cdom, csuc(c1)), wbr(c1, cdom, csuc(c1)))
  mpisyl(wcel(c1, com), wbr(c1, cdom, csuc(c1)), wcel(csuc(c1), com), wss(c1, csuc(c1)))
  peano2(c1)
  sssucid(c1)
  ssdomg(csuc(c1), com, c1)
  endomtr(c0, c1, csuc(c1))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com)), wbr(c0, cen, c1), wi(wss(com, c0), wbr(csuc(c1), cdom, c0)))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com), wi(wss(com, c0), wbr(csuc(c1), cdom, c0)))
  syld(wa(wcel(c1, com), wcel(c0, con0)), wss(com, c0), wbr(csuc(c1), cdom, c0), wss(csuc(c1), c0))
  sylibd(wa(wcel(c1, com), wcel(c0, con0)), wss(com, c0), wss(csuc(c1), c0), wcel(c1, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c1, com), wcel(c0, con0), wi(wss(com, c0), wcel(c1, c0)))
  com12(wcel(c1, com), wss(com, c0), wcel(c1, c0))
  ssel(com, c0, c1)
  sylan2(wcel(c1, com), wcel(c0, con0), wb(wcel(c1, c0), wss(csuc(c1), c0)), word(c0))
  ordelsuc(c1, com, c0)
  adantl(wcel(c1, com), wcel(c0, con0), wi(wss(csuc(c1), c0), wbr(csuc(c1), cdom, c0)))
  ssdomg(c0, con0, csuc(c1))
  sbth(c0, csuc(c1))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com), wbr(c0, cen, c1), wb(wcel(c0, com), wn(wss(com, c0))))
  con2bid(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c0, com), wss(com, c0))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, con0), wb(wss(com, c0), wn(wcel(c0, com))), word(com), word(c0))
  ordom()
  eloni(c0)
  ordtri1(com, c0)
  simplr(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com), wbr(c0, cen, c1))
  biimpa(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wbr(c0, cen, c1), wceq(c0, c1))
  nneneq(c0, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com), wi(wceq(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cen, c1)))
  eqeng(c0, con0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm onomeneq(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ _om)→(c0[≅]c1 ↔ c0 = c1))
} = {
  impbid((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ _om), c0[≅]c1, c0 = c1)
  ex((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ _om), c0[≅]c1, c0 = c1)
  sylancom((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ _om), c0[≅]c1, c0 = c1, (c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om))
  jca(((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ _om)∧ c0[≅]c1), c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om)
  mpbird(((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ _om)∧ c0[≅]c1), c0 ∈ _om, ¬ _om ⊆ c0)
  mtod(((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ _om)∧ c0[≅]c1), _om ⊆ c0, c0[≅]suc(c1))
  mtbird(((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ _om)∧ c0[≅]c1), c0[≅]suc(c1), c1[≅]suc(c1))
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈ On, c1 ∈ _om, c0[≅]c1, ¬ c1[≅]suc(c1))
  php5(c1)
  adantl((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ _om), c0[≅]c1, (c0[≅]suc(c1)↔ c1[≅]suc(c1)))
  enen1(c0, c1, suc(c1))
  syl6(((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ _om)∧ c0[≅]c1), _om ⊆ c0, c0[≅]suc(c1), (c0[≼]suc(c1)∧ suc(c1)[≼]c0))
  jcad(((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ _om)∧ c0[≅]c1), _om ⊆ c0, c0[≼]suc(c1), suc(c1)[≼]c0)
  adantll(c0 ∈ On, c1 ∈ _om, c0[≅]c1, (_om ⊆ c0 → c0[≼]suc(c1)))
  a1d((c1 ∈ _om ∧ c0[≅]c1), _om ⊆ c0, c0[≼]suc(c1))
  ancoms(c1 ∈ _om, c0[≅]c1, c0[≼]suc(c1))
  sylan2(c0[≅]c1, c1 ∈ _om, c0[≼]suc(c1), c1[≼]suc(c1))
  mpisyl(c1 ∈ _om, c1[≼]suc(c1), suc(c1)∈ _om, c1 ⊆ suc(c1))
  peano2(c1)
  sssucid(c1)
  ssdomg(suc(c1), com, c1)
  endomtr(c0, c1, suc(c1))
  adantr((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ _om), c0[≅]c1, (_om ⊆ c0 → suc(c1)[≼]c0))
  ancoms(c0 ∈ On, c1 ∈ _om, (_om ⊆ c0 → suc(c1)[≼]c0))
  syld((c1 ∈ _om ∧ c0 ∈ On), _om ⊆ c0, suc(c1)[≼]c0, suc(c1)⊆ c0)
  sylibd((c1 ∈ _om ∧ c0 ∈ On), _om ⊆ c0, suc(c1)⊆ c0, c1 ∈ c0)
  adantr(c1 ∈ _om, c0 ∈ On, (_om ⊆ c0 → c1 ∈ c0))
  com12(c1 ∈ _om, _om ⊆ c0, c1 ∈ c0)
  ssel(com, c0, c1)
  sylan2(c1 ∈ _om, c0 ∈ On, (c1 ∈ c0 ↔ suc(c1)⊆ c0), Ord(c0))
  ordelsuc(c1, com, c0)
  adantl(c1 ∈ _om, c0 ∈ On, (suc(c1)⊆ c0 → suc(c1)[≼]c0))
  ssdomg(c0, con0, suc(c1))
  sbth(c0, suc(c1))
  ad2antrr(c0 ∈ On, c1 ∈ _om, c0[≅]c1, (c0 ∈ _om ↔ ¬ _om ⊆ c0))
  con2bid(c0 ∈ On, c0 ∈ _om, _om ⊆ c0)
  sylancr(c0 ∈ On, (_om ⊆ c0 ↔ ¬ c0 ∈ _om), Ord(_om), Ord(c0))
  ordom()
  eloni(c0)
  ordtri1(com, c0)
  simplr(c0 ∈ On, c1 ∈ _om, c0[≅]c1)
  biimpa((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om), c0[≅]c1, c0 = c1)
  nneneq(c0, c1)
  adantr(c0 ∈ On, c1 ∈ _om, (c0 = c1 → c0[≅]c1))
  eqeng(c0, con0, c1)
}

blocks.name: onfin
blocks.content: An ordinal number is finite iff it is a natural number. Proposition 10.32 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 92. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jul-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm onfin(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wb(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c0, com)))
} = {
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c0, com), wrex(hs0, com, wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0))))
  isfi(hs0, c0)
  impbid1(wcel(c0, con0), wrex(hs0, com, wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, com))
  rexlimdva(hs0, com, wcel(c0, con0), wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, com))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), com)), wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, com), wceq(c0, cv(hs0)))
  onomeneq(c0, cv(hs0))
  adantl(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), com), wi(wceq(c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, com)))
  eleq1a(cv(hs0), com, c0)
  mpdan(wcel(c0, com), wrex(hs0, com, wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0))), wbr(c0, cen, c0))
  enrefg(c0, com)
  rspcev(hs0, c0, com, wbr(c0, cen, c0), wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c0, c0, cen)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, con0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, com))
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, cen, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm onfin(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ On →(c0 ∈ Fin ↔ c0 ∈ _om))
} = {
  syl5bb(c0 ∈ On, c0 ∈ Fin, c0 ∈ _om, ∃(hs0 ∈ _om, c0[≅]hs0))
  isfi(hs0, c0)
  impbid1(c0 ∈ On, ∃(hs0 ∈ _om, c0[≅]hs0), c0 ∈ _om)
  rexlimdva(hs0, com, c0 ∈ On, c0[≅]hs0, c0 ∈ _om)
  sylbid((c0 ∈ On ∧ hs0 ∈ _om), c0[≅]hs0, c0 ∈ _om, c0 = hs0)
  onomeneq(c0, hs0)
  adantl(c0 ∈ On, hs0 ∈ _om, (c0 = hs0 → c0 ∈ _om))
  eleq1a(hs0, com, c0)
  mpdan(c0 ∈ _om, ∃(hs0 ∈ _om, c0[≅]hs0), c0[≅]c0)
  enrefg(c0, com)
  rspcev(hs0, c0, com, c0[≅]c0, c0[≅]hs0)
  breq2(hs0, c0, c0, cen)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ On)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ _om)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w(c0[≅]c0)
}

blocks.name: onfin2
blocks.content: A set is a natural number iff it is a finite ordinal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jan-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm onfin2() {
  |- wceq(com, cin(con0, cfn))
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, com, cin(con0, cfn))
  bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), com), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(con0, cfn)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn)))
  impbii(wcel(cv(hs0), com), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn)))
  jcai(wcel(cv(hs0), com), wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn))
  nnon(cv(hs0))
  biimprcd(wcel(cv(hs0), com), wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn))
  biimpa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn), wcel(cv(hs0), com))
  onfin(cv(hs0))
  elin(cv(hs0), con0, cfn)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(con0, cfn))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm onfin2() {
  ⊢ _om =(On ⋂ Fin)
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, com, (On ⋂ Fin))
  bitr4i(hs0 ∈ _om, hs0 ∈(On ⋂ Fin), (hs0 ∈ On ∧ hs0 ∈ Fin))
  impbii(hs0 ∈ _om, (hs0 ∈ On ∧ hs0 ∈ Fin))
  jcai(hs0 ∈ _om, hs0 ∈ On, hs0 ∈ Fin)
  nnon(hs0)
  biimprcd(hs0 ∈ _om, hs0 ∈ On, hs0 ∈ Fin)
  biimpa(hs0 ∈ On, hs0 ∈ Fin, hs0 ∈ _om)
  onfin(hs0)
  elin(hs0, con0, cfn)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.c((On ⋂ Fin))
}

blocks.name: nnfi
blocks.content: Natural numbers are finite sets. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: nndomo
blocks.content: Cardinal ordering agrees with natural number ordering. Example 3 of [Enderton] p. 146. (Contributed by NM, 17-Jun-1998.)
blocks.origin:
thm nndomo(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wb(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wss(c0, c1)))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wss(c0, c1))
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com)), wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wss(c0, c1), wn(wpss(c1, c0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wi(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wn(wpss(c1, c0))))
  nsyli(wcel(c0, com), wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wpss(c1, c0), wbr(c1, csdm, c0))
  ex(wcel(c0, com), wpss(c1, c0), wbr(c1, csdm, c0))
  php2(c0, c1)
  domnsym(c0, c1)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wb(wss(c0, c1), wn(wpss(c1, c0))), word(c0), word(c1))
  nnord(c0)
  nnord(c1)
  bitrd(wa(word(c0), word(c1)), wss(c0, c1), wn(wpss(c1, c0)), wn(wcel(c1, c0)))
  ordtri1(c0, c1)
  notbid(wa(word(c0), word(c1)), wcel(c1, c0), wpss(c1, c0))
  ancoms(word(c0), word(c1), wb(wcel(c1, c0), wpss(c1, c0)))
  ordelpss(c1, c0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, com), wi(wss(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cdom, c1)))
  ssdomg(c1, com, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nndomo(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om)→(c0[≼]c1 ↔ c0 ⊆ c1))
} = {
  impbid((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om), c0[≼]c1, c0 ⊆ c1)
  sylibrd((c0 ∈ _om ∧ c1 ∈ _om), c0[≼]c1, c0 ⊆ c1, ¬ c1 ⊊ c0)
  adantr(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om, (c0[≼]c1 → ¬ c1 ⊊ c0))
  nsyli(c0 ∈ _om, c0[≼]c1, c1 ⊊ c0, c1[≺]c0)
  ex(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ⊊ c0, c1[≺]c0)
  php2(c0, c1)
  domnsym(c0, c1)
  syl2an(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om, (c0 ⊆ c1 ↔ ¬ c1 ⊊ c0), Ord(c0), Ord(c1))
  nnord(c0)
  nnord(c1)
  bitrd((Ord(c0)∧ Ord(c1)), c0 ⊆ c1, ¬ c1 ⊊ c0, ¬ c1 ∈ c0)
  ordtri1(c0, c1)
  notbid((Ord(c0)∧ Ord(c1)), c1 ∈ c0, c1 ⊊ c0)
  ancoms(Ord(c0), Ord(c1), (c1 ∈ c0 ↔ c1 ⊊ c0))
  ordelpss(c1, c0)
  adantl(c0 ∈ _om, c1 ∈ _om, (c0 ⊆ c1 → c0[≼]c1))
  ssdomg(c1, com, c0)
}

blocks.name: nnsdomo
blocks.content: Cardinal ordering agrees with natural number ordering. (Contributed by NM, 17-Jun-1998.)

blocks.name: sucdom2
blocks.content: Strict dominance of a set over another set implies dominance over its successor. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jan-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm sucdom2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, csdm, c1), wbr(csuc(c0), cdom, c1))
} = {
  exlimddv(hs0, wbr(c0, csdm, c1), wbr(csuc(c0), cdom, c1), wf1(cv(hs0), c0, c1))
  syl(wbr(c0, csdm, c1), wex(hs0, wf1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)), wbr(c0, cdom, c1))
  sdomdom(c0, c1)
  brdomi(hs0, c0, c1)
  3brtr4d(csuc(c0), cdom, c1, cun(c0, csn(c0)), cun(crn(cv(hs0)), cdif(c1, crn(cv(hs0)))), wa(wbr(c0, csdm, c1), wf1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)))
  syl21anc(wa(wbr(c0, csdm, c1), wf1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)), wbr(cun(c0, csn(c0)), cdom, cun(crn(cv(hs0)), cdif(c1, crn(cv(hs0))))), wbr(c0, cdom, crn(cv(hs0))), wbr(csn(c0), cdom, cdif(c1, crn(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cin(crn(cv(hs0)), cdif(c1, crn(cv(hs0)))), emptycls))
  syl3anc(wa(wbr(c0, csdm, c1), wf1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)), wbr(c0, cdom, crn(cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(crn(cv(hs0)), universe), wf1(cv(hs0), c0, crn(cv(hs0))))
  a1i(wa(wbr(c0, csdm, c1), wf1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)), wcel(crn(cv(hs0)), universe))
  rnex(cv(hs0))
  syl(wa(wbr(c0, csdm, c1), wf1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)), wf1(cv(hs0), c0, crn(cv(hs0))), wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, crn(cv(hs0))))
  adantl(wbr(c0, csdm, c1), wf1(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, crn(cv(hs0))))
  f1f1orn(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  f1of1(cv(hs0), c0, crn(cv(hs0)))
  f1dom2g(c0, universe, crn(cv(hs0)), universe, cv(hs0))
  mpd(wa(wbr(c0, csdm, c1), wf1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)), wbr(csn(c0), cdom, cdif(c1, crn(cv(hs0)))), wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c1, crn(cv(hs0))))))
  sylib(wa(wbr(c0, csdm, c1), wf1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)), wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c1, crn(cv(hs0))))), wn(wceq(cdif(c1, crn(cv(hs0))), emptycls)))
  mtod(wa(wbr(c0, csdm, c1), wf1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)), wceq(cdif(c1, crn(cv(hs0))), emptycls), wbr(c0, cen, c1))
  adantr(wbr(c0, csdm, c1), wf1(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wn(wbr(c0, cen, c1)))
  sdomnen(c0, c1)
  syl5bir(wa(wbr(c0, csdm, c1), wf1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)), wceq(cdif(c1, crn(cv(hs0))), emptycls), wbr(c0, cen, c1), wss(c1, crn(cv(hs0))))
  ssdif0(c1, crn(cv(hs0)))
  ex(wa(wbr(c0, csdm, c1), wf1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)), wss(c1, crn(cv(hs0))), wbr(c0, cen, c1))
  sylancr(wa(wa(wbr(c0, csdm, c1), wf1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)), wss(c1, crn(cv(hs0)))), wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1))

blocks.name: sucdom
blocks.content: Strict dominance of a set over a natural number is the same as dominance over its successor. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jan-2013.)

blocks.name: 0sdom1dom
blocks.content: Strict dominance over zero is the same as dominance over one. (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2004.)

blocks.name: 1sdom2
blocks.content: Ordinal 1 is strictly dominated by ordinal 2. (Contributed by NM, 4-Apr-2007.)

blocks.name: sdom1
blocks.content: A set has less than one member iff it is empty. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:

}

blocks.name: pssinf
blocks.content: A set equinumerous to a proper subset of itself is infinite. Corollary 6D(a) of [Enderton] p. 136. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jun-1998.)

blocks.name: fisseneq
blocks.content: A finite set is equal to its subset if they are equinumerous. (Contributed by FL, 11-Aug-2008.)

blocks.name: ominf
blocks.content: The set of natural numbers is infinite. Corollary 6D(b) of [Enderton] p. 136. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jun-1998.)
blocks.origin:
thm ominf() {
  |- wn(wcel(com, cfn))
} = {
  ax-mp(wn(wcel(com, cfn)), wi(wcel(com, cfn), wn(wcel(com, cfn))))

  diff.hs0.w(wn(wcel(com, cfn)))
}

thm ominf() {
  ⊢ ¬ _om ∈ Fin
} = {
  ax-mp(¬ _om ∈ Fin, (_om ∈ Fin → ¬ _om ∈ Fin))
  sylbi(_om ∈ Fin, ¬ _om ∈ Fin, ∃(hs0 ∈ _om, _om[≅]hs0))
  isfi(hs0, com)
  rexlimiva(hs0, com, _om[≅]hs0, ¬ _om ∈ Fin)
  syl2an(hs0 ∈ _om, _om[≅]hs0, ¬ _om ∈ Fin, hs0 ⊊ _om, hs0[≅]_om)
  sylibr(hs0 ∈ _om, hs0 ⊊ _om, (hs0 ⊆ _om ∧ hs0 ≠ _om))
  ibi(hs0 ∈ _om, (hs0 ⊆ _om ∧ hs0 ≠ _om))
  sylancl(hs0 ∈ _om, (hs0 ∈ _om ↔(hs0 ⊆ _om ∧ hs0 ≠ _om)), Ord(hs0), Ord(_om))
  nnord(hs0)
  ordom()
  ordelssne(hs0, com)
  df-pss(hs0, com)
  ensym(com, hs0)
  pssinf(hs0, com)
  pm2.01(_om ∈ Fin)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w(¬ _om ∈ Fin)
}

blocks.name: isinf
blocks.content: Any set that is not finite is literally infinite, in the sense that it contains subsets of arbitrarily large finite cardinality. (It cannot be proven that the set has _countably infinite_ subsets unless AC is invoked.) The proof does not require the Axiom of Infinity. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2013.)

  ad2ant2lr(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, cfn)), wcel(cv(hs0), com), wcel(cv(hs1), com), wex(hs3, wa(wss(cv(hs3), c0), wbr(cv(hs3), cen, cv(hs0)))))
  r19.21bi(hs0, com, wn(wcel(c0, cfn)), wex(hs3, wa(wss(cv(hs3), c0), wbr(cv(hs3), cen, cv(hs0)))))
  isinf(hs0, hs3, c0)
  eximi(hs3, wa(wss(cv(hs3), c0), wbr(cv(hs3), cen, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs3), crab(hs2, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cen, cv(hs0)))))

  adantl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, cfn))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), com), wcel(cv(hs1), com))), wcel(cv(hs3), crab(hs2, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cen, cv(hs0)))), wi(wcel(cv(hs3), crab(hs2, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cen, cv(hs1)))), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, cv(hs1))))
  ex(wcel(cv(hs3), crab(hs2, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cen, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs3), crab(hs2, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cen, cv(hs1)))), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, cv(hs1)))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(hs3), crab(hs2, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cen, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs3), crab(hs2, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cen, cv(hs1)))), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs3), cen, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs3), cen, cv(hs1)))
  simprbi(wcel(cv(hs3), crab(hs2, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cen, cv(hs0)))), wbr(cv(hs3), cen, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs3), cpw(c0)))
  elrab(hs2, cv(hs3), cpw(c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cen, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs3), cen, cv(hs0)))
  breq1(cv(hs2), cv(hs3), cen, cv(hs0))
  simprbi(wcel(cv(hs3), crab(hs2, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cen, cv(hs1)))), wbr(cv(hs3), cen, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs3), cpw(c0)))
  elrab(hs2, cv(hs3), cpw(c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cen, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs3), cen, cv(hs1)))
  breq1(cv(hs2), cv(hs3), cen, cv(hs1))
  sylan(wbr(cv(hs3), cen, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs3), cen, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, cv(hs3)))
  ensym(cv(hs3), cv(hs0))
  entr(cv(hs0), cv(hs3), cv(hs1))
  ad2antlr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, cfn))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), com), wcel(cv(hs1), com)), wcel(cv(hs3), crab(hs2, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cen, cv(hs0)))), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cen, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))

  rabbidv(hs2, cpw(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs2), cen, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs2), cen, cv(hs1)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2), cen)

  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cpw(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(hs2, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cen, cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs1.c(cpw(cpw(c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(com)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(hs2, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cen, cv(hs0))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, cfn))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, cfn))))
  diff.hs2.c(cpw(c0))
  diff.hs3.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, cfn))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), com), wcel(cv(hs1), com))))
  diff.hs3.w(wi(wceq(crab(hs2, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cen, cv(hs0))), crab(hs2, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(hs2), cen, cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)

thm fineqvlem(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ Fin)→ _om[≼]P(P(c0)))
} = {
  mpd((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ Fin), _om[≼]P(P(c0)), P(P(c0))∈ 𝕌)
  pwexd(P(c0), universe, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ Fin))
  dom2d(hs0, hs1, P(P(c0)), universe, com, { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 }, { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs1 }, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ Fin))
  a1d((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ Fin), hs0 ∈ _om, { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 } ∈ P(P(c0)))
  mpbiri((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ Fin), { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 } ∈ P(P(c0)), { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 } ⊆ P(c0))
  ssrab2(hs2, P(c0), hs2[≅]hs0)
  syl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ Fin), ({ hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 } ∈ P(P(c0))↔ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 } ⊆ P(c0)), P(c0)∈ 𝕌)
  adantr(c0 ∈ c1, ¬ c0 ∈ Fin, P(c0)∈ 𝕌)
  pwexg(c0, c1)
  elpw2g(P(c0), universe, { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 })
  ex((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ Fin), (hs0 ∈ _om ∧ hs1 ∈ _om), ({ hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 } = { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs1 } ↔ hs0 = hs1))
  impbid1(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ Fin)∧(hs0 ∈ _om ∧ hs1 ∈ _om)), { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 } = { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs1 }, hs0 = hs1)
  exlimddv(hs3, ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ Fin)∧(hs0 ∈ _om ∧ hs1 ∈ _om)), ({ hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 } = { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs1 } → hs0 = hs1), hs3 ∈ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 })
  syl(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ Fin)∧(hs0 ∈ _om ∧ hs1 ∈ _om)), ∃(hs3, hs3 ∈ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 }), ∃(hs3,(hs3 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs3[≅]hs0)))
  ad2ant2lr(c0 ∈ c1, ¬ c0 ∈ Fin, hs0 ∈ _om, hs1 ∈ _om, ∃(hs3,(hs3 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs3[≅]hs0)))
  r19.21bi(hs0, com, ¬ c0 ∈ Fin, ∃(hs3,(hs3 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs3[≅]hs0)))
  isinf(hs0, hs3, c0)
  eximi(hs3, (hs3 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs3[≅]hs0), hs3 ∈ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 })
  sylibr((hs3 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs3[≅]hs0), hs3 ∈ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 }, (hs3 ∈ P(c0)∧ hs3[≅]hs0))
  anim1i(hs3 ⊆ c0, hs3[≅]hs0, hs3 ∈ P(c0))
  biimpri(hs3 ⊆ c0, hs3 ∈ P(c0))
  selpw(hs3, c0)
  3syld((((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ Fin)∧(hs0 ∈ _om ∧ hs1 ∈ _om))∧ hs3 ∈ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 }), { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 } = { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs1 }, hs0 = hs1, hs3 ∈ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs1 }, hs0[≅]hs1)
  adantl(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ Fin)∧(hs0 ∈ _om ∧ hs1 ∈ _om)), hs3 ∈ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 }, ({ hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 } = { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs1 } → hs3 ∈ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs1 }))
  biimpcd(hs3 ∈ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 }, { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 } = { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs1 }, hs3 ∈ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs1 })
  eleq2({ hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 }, { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs1 }, hs3)
  adantl(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ Fin)∧(hs0 ∈ _om ∧ hs1 ∈ _om)), hs3 ∈ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 }, (hs3 ∈ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs1 } → hs0[≅]hs1))
  ex(hs3 ∈ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 }, hs3 ∈ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs1 }, hs0[≅]hs1)
  syl2an(hs3 ∈ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 }, hs3 ∈ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs1 }, hs0[≅]hs1, hs3[≅]hs0, hs3[≅]hs1)
  simprbi(hs3 ∈ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 }, hs3[≅]hs0, hs3 ∈ P(c0))
  elrab(hs2, hs3, P(c0), hs2[≅]hs0, hs3[≅]hs0)
  breq1(hs2, hs3, cen, hs0)
  simprbi(hs3 ∈ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs1 }, hs3[≅]hs1, hs3 ∈ P(c0))
  elrab(hs2, hs3, P(c0), hs2[≅]hs1, hs3[≅]hs1)
  breq1(hs2, hs3, cen, hs1)
  sylan(hs3[≅]hs0, hs3[≅]hs1, hs0[≅]hs1, hs0[≅]hs3)
  ensym(hs3, hs0)
  entr(hs0, hs3, hs1)
  ad2antlr((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ Fin), (hs0 ∈ _om ∧ hs1 ∈ _om), hs3 ∈ { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 }, (hs0[≅]hs1 → hs0 = hs1))
  biimpd((hs0 ∈ _om ∧ hs1 ∈ _om), hs0[≅]hs1, hs0 = hs1)
  nneneq(hs0, hs1)
  rabbidv(hs2, P(c0), hs0 = hs1, hs2[≅]hs0, hs2[≅]hs1)
  breq2(hs0, hs1, hs2, cen)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(P(P(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.c({ hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs1 })
  diff.hs1.c(P(P(c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(com)
  diff.hs1.c({ hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 })
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ Fin))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ Fin))
  diff.hs2.c(P(c0))
  diff.hs3.w(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ Fin)∧(hs0 ∈ _om ∧ hs1 ∈ _om)))
  diff.hs3.w(({ hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs0 } = { hs2 ∈ P(c0)| hs2[≅]hs1 } → hs0 = hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(hs3)
  diff.hs2.w(hs3[≅]hs0)
  diff.hs2.w(hs3[≅]hs1)
  diff.hs2.w(hs0 = hs1)
}

blocks.name: fineqv
blocks.content: If the Axiom of Infinity is denied, then all sets are finite (which implies the Axiom of Choice). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Jan-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fineqv() {
  |- wb(wn(wcel(com, universe)), wceq(cfn, universe))
} = {
  impbii(wn(wcel(com, universe)), wceq(cfn, universe))
  eqssd(cfn, universe, wn(wcel(com, universe)))
  a1i(wn(wcel(com, universe)), wss(cfn, universe))
  ssv(cfn)
  ssrdv(hs0, universe, cfn, wn(wcel(com, universe)))
  a1d(wn(wcel(com, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn))
  con1i(wcel(com, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn))
  syl(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cfn)), wcel(com, universe), wbr(com, cdom, cpw(cpw(cv(hs0)))))
  mpan(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cfn)), wbr(com, cdom, cpw(cpw(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  fineqvlem(cv(hs0), universe)
  brrelex1i(com, cdom, cpw(cpw(cv(hs0))))
  reldom()
  mtbii(wceq(cfn, universe), wcel(com, universe), wcel(com, cfn))
  ominf()
  eleq2(cfn, universe, com)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cfn)
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wcel(com, universe)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fineqv() {
  ⊢ (¬ _om ∈ 𝕌 ↔ Fin = 𝕌)
} = {
  impbii(¬ _om ∈ 𝕌, Fin = 𝕌)
  eqssd(cfn, universe, ¬ _om ∈ 𝕌)
  a1i(¬ _om ∈ 𝕌, Fin ⊆ 𝕌)
  ssv(cfn)
  ssrdv(hs0, universe, cfn, ¬ _om ∈ 𝕌)
  a1d(¬ _om ∈ 𝕌, hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs0 ∈ Fin)
  con1i(_om ∈ 𝕌, hs0 ∈ Fin)
  syl(¬ hs0 ∈ Fin, _om ∈ 𝕌, _om[≼]P(P(hs0)))
  mpan(¬ hs0 ∈ Fin, _om[≼]P(P(hs0)), hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(hs0)
  fineqvlem(hs0, universe)
  brrelex1i(com, cdom, P(P(hs0)))
  reldom()
  mtbii(Fin = 𝕌, _om ∈ 𝕌, _om ∈ Fin)
  ominf()
  eleq2(cfn, universe, com)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cfn)
  diff.hs0.w(¬ _om ∈ 𝕌)
}

blocks.name: enfi
blocks.content: Equinumerous sets have the same finiteness. (Contributed by NM, 22-Aug-2008.)

blocks.name: enfii
blocks.content: A set equinumerous to a finite set is finite. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: pssnn
blocks.content: A proper subset of a natural number is equinumerous to some smaller number. Lemma 6F of [Enderton] p. 137. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jun-1998.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm pssnn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, com), wpss(c1, c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cen, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, com), wpss(c1, c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cen, cv(s0))), wcel(c1, universe))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, com), wpss(c1, c0), wcel(c1, universe))
  sylan(wpss(c1, c0), wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, universe), wss(c1, c0))
  pssss(c1, c0)

thm ssnnfi(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, com), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(c1, cfn))
} = {

  jaodan(wcel(c0, com), wpss(c1, c0), wceq(c1, c0), wrex(hs0, com, wbr(c1, cen, cv(hs0))))
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, com), wpss(c1, c0)), wrex(hs0, com, wbr(c1, cen, cv(hs0))), wrex(hs0, c0, wbr(c1, cen, cv(hs0))))
  pssnn(hs0, c0, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, com), wpss(c1, c0), wi(wrex(hs0, c0, wbr(c1, cen, cv(hs0))), wrex(hs0, com, wbr(c1, cen, cv(hs0)))))
  reximdv2(hs0, c0, com, wcel(c0, com), wbr(c1, cen, cv(hs0)), wbr(c1, cen, cv(hs0)))
  anim1d(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(c1, cen, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), com))
  expcom(wcel(c0, com), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), com))
  elnn(cv(hs0), c0)
  3syl(wa(wcel(c0, com), wceq(c1, c0)), wrex(hs0, com, wbr(c1, cen, cv(hs0))), wcel(c1, com), wa(wcel(c1, com), wbr(c1, cen, c1)))
  biimparc(wcel(c0, com), wceq(c1, c0), wcel(c1, com))
  eleq1(c1, c0, com)
  ancli(wcel(c1, com), wbr(c1, cen, c1))
  enrefg(c1, com)
  rspcev(hs0, c1, com, wbr(c1, cen, c1), wbr(c1, cen, cv(hs0)))

  exp32(hs0 ∈ _om, (hs1 : c0 ↔ hs0), c1 ⊆ c0, c1 ∈ Fin)
  mpd((hs0 ∈ _om ∧((hs1 : c0 ↔ hs0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0)), c1 ∈ Fin, ∃(hs2 ∈ _om,(hs1 " c1)[≅]hs2))
  adantrr(hs0 ∈ _om, (hs1 : c0 ↔ hs0), c1 ⊆ c0, ∃(hs2 ∈ _om,(hs1 " c1)[≅]hs2))
  sylan2(hs0 ∈ _om, (hs1 : c0 ↔ hs0), ∃(hs2 ∈ _om,(hs1 " c1)[≅]hs2), (hs1 " c1)⊆ hs0)
  syl((hs1 : c0 ↔ hs0), (hs1 " c1)⊆ hs0, (hs1 : c0 ↠ hs0))
  f1ofo(hs1, c0, hs0)
  syl5sseq((hs1 " c1), hs0, ran(hs1), (hs1 : c0 ↠ hs0))
  imassrn(hs1, c1)
  forn(hs1, c0, hs0)
  sylib((hs0 ∈ _om ∧(hs1 " c1)⊆ hs0), ∃(hs2 ∈ _om,(hs1 " c1)[≅]hs2), (hs1 " c1)∈ Fin)
  ssnnfi(hs0, (hs1 " c1))
  isfi(hs2, (hs1 " c1))
  adantl(hs0 ∈ _om, ((hs1 : c0 ↔ hs0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0), (∃(hs2 ∈ _om,(hs1 " c1)[≅]hs2)→ c1 ∈ Fin))
  syl6ibr(((hs1 : c0 ↔ hs0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0), ∃(hs2 ∈ _om,(hs1 " c1)[≅]hs2), c1 ∈ Fin, ∃(hs2 ∈ _om, c1[≅]hs2))
  reximdv(hs2, com, ((hs1 : c0 ↔ hs0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0), (hs1 " c1)[≅]hs2, c1[≅]hs2)
  ex(((hs1 : c0 ↔ hs0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0), (hs1 " c1)[≅]hs2, c1[≅]hs2)
  sylan(((hs1 : c0 ↔ hs0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0), (hs1 " c1)[≅]hs2, c1[≅]hs2, ((hs1 |` c1): c1 ↔(hs1 " c1)))
  sylan((hs1 : c0 ↔ hs0), c1 ⊆ c0, ((hs1 |` c1): c1 ↔(hs1 " c1)), (hs1 : c0 ↣ hs0))
  f1of1(hs1, c0, hs0)
  f1ores(hs1, c0, hs0, c1)
  sylan(((hs1 |` c1): c1 ↔(hs1 " c1)), (hs1 " c1)[≅]hs2, c1[≅]hs2, c1[≅](hs1 " c1))
  sylibr(((hs1 |` c1): c1 ↔(hs1 " c1)), c1[≅](hs1 " c1), ∃(hs0,(hs0 : c1 ↔(hs1 " c1))))
  spcev(hs0, (hs1 |` c1), ((hs1 |` c1): c1 ↔(hs1 " c1)), (hs0 : c1 ↔(hs1 " c1)))
  resex(hs1, c1)
  vex(hs1)
  f1oeq1(hs0, (hs1 |` c1), c1, (hs1 " c1))
  bren(hs0, c1, (hs1 " c1))
  entr(c1, (hs1 " c1), hs2)
  isfi(hs2, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ⊆ c0 → c1 ∈ Fin))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ∈ _om)
  diff.hs1.w((c1 ⊆ c0 → c1 ∈ Fin))
  diff.hs2.c((hs1 " c1))
  diff.hs2.w(((hs1 : c0 ↔ hs0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0))
  diff.hs0.c((hs1 |` c1))
  diff.hs0.w(((hs1 |` c1): c1 ↔(hs1 " c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((hs1 " c1))
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: domfi
blocks.content: A set dominated by a finite set is finite. (Contributed by NM, 23-Mar-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm domfi(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(c1, cdom, c0)), wcel(c1, cfn))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(c1, cdom, c0), wcel(c1, cfn))
  sylbid(wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(c1, cdom, c0), wcel(c1, cfn), wex(hs0, wa(wbr(c1, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c0))))
  domeng(hs0, c0, cfn, c1)
  exlimdv(hs0, wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wbr(c1, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(c1, cfn))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wbr(c1, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(c1, cfn))
  sylancom(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wbr(c1, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn))
  adantrl(wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(c1, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn))
  ssfi(c0, cv(hs0))
  adantrr(wcel(cv(hs0), cfn), wbr(c1, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c1, cfn))
  enfii(cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfn))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, cfn))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm domfi(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1[≼]c0)→ c1 ∈ Fin)
} = {
  imp(c0 ∈ Fin, c1[≼]c0, c1 ∈ Fin)
  sylbid(c0 ∈ Fin, c1[≼]c0, c1 ∈ Fin, ∃(hs0,(c1[≅]hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c0)))
  domeng(hs0, c0, cfn, c1)
  exlimdv(hs0, c0 ∈ Fin, (c1[≅]hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c0), c1 ∈ Fin)
  ex(c0 ∈ Fin, (c1[≅]hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c0), c1 ∈ Fin)
  sylancom(c0 ∈ Fin, (c1[≅]hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c0), c1 ∈ Fin, hs0 ∈ Fin)
  adantrl(c0 ∈ Fin, c1[≅]hs0, hs0 ⊆ c0, hs0 ∈ Fin)
  ssfi(c0, hs0)
  adantrr(hs0 ∈ Fin, c1[≅]hs0, hs0 ⊆ c0, c1 ∈ Fin)
  enfii(hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ Fin)
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ∈ Fin)
}

blocks.name: xpfir
blocks.content: The components of a nonempty finite Cartesian product are finite. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 11-Apr-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpfir(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(cxp(c0, c1), cfn), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls)), wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, cfn)))
} = {
  jca(wa(wcel(cxp(c0, c1), cfn), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls)), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, cfn))
  syldan(wcel(cxp(c0, c1), cfn), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(c0, cdom, cxp(c0, c1)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(cxp(c0, c1), cfn), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls)), wbr(c0, cdom, cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wne(c1, emptycls))
  simprd(wa(wcel(cxp(c0, c1), cfn), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls)), wne(c1, emptycls), wne(c0, emptycls))
  xpdom3(c0, universe, c1, universe)
  domfi(cxp(c0, c1), c0)
  syldan(wcel(cxp(c0, c1), cfn), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wcel(c1, cfn), wbr(c1, cdom, cxp(c0, c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(cxp(c0, c1), cfn), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls)), wbr(c1, cdom, cxp(c0, c1)), wbr(c1, cdom, cxp(c1, c0)), wbr(cxp(c1, c0), cen, cxp(c0, c1)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(cxp(c0, c1), cfn), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls)), wbr(c1, cdom, cxp(c1, c0)), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wne(c0, emptycls))
  simpld(wa(wcel(cxp(c0, c1), cfn), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls)), wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(cxp(c0, c1), cfn), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls)), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls)), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls))
  simpr(wcel(cxp(c0, c1), cfn), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls))
  xpnz(c0, c1)
  xpdom3(c1, universe, c0, universe)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(cxp(c0, c1), cfn), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls)), wbr(cxp(c1, c0), cen, cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, universe))
  simprd(wa(wcel(cxp(c0, c1), cfn), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls)), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, universe))
  simpld(wa(wcel(cxp(c0, c1), cfn), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  xpexr2(c0, c1, cfn)
  xpcomeng(c1, universe, c0, universe)
  domentr(c1, cxp(c1, c0), cxp(c0, c1))
  domfi(cxp(c0, c1), c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xpfir(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (((c0 × c1)∈ Fin ∧(c0 × c1)≠ ∅)→(c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈ Fin))
} = {
  jca(((c0 × c1)∈ Fin ∧(c0 × c1)≠ ∅), c0 ∈ Fin, c1 ∈ Fin)
  syldan((c0 × c1)∈ Fin, (c0 × c1)≠ ∅, c0 ∈ Fin, c0[≼](c0 × c1))
  syl3anc(((c0 × c1)∈ Fin ∧(c0 × c1)≠ ∅), c0[≼](c0 × c1), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ≠ ∅)
  simprd(((c0 × c1)∈ Fin ∧(c0 × c1)≠ ∅), c1 ≠ ∅, c0 ≠ ∅)
  xpdom3(c0, universe, c1, universe)
  domfi((c0 × c1), c0)
  syldan((c0 × c1)∈ Fin, (c0 × c1)≠ ∅, c1 ∈ Fin, c1[≼](c0 × c1))
  syl2anc(((c0 × c1)∈ Fin ∧(c0 × c1)≠ ∅), c1[≼](c0 × c1), c1[≼](c1 × c0), (c1 × c0)[≅](c0 × c1))
  syl3anc(((c0 × c1)∈ Fin ∧(c0 × c1)≠ ∅), c1[≼](c1 × c0), c1 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ≠ ∅)
  simpld(((c0 × c1)∈ Fin ∧(c0 × c1)≠ ∅), c0 ≠ ∅, c1 ≠ ∅)
  sylibr(((c0 × c1)∈ Fin ∧(c0 × c1)≠ ∅), (c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ c1 ≠ ∅), (c0 × c1)≠ ∅)
  simpr((c0 × c1)∈ Fin, (c0 × c1)≠ ∅)
  xpnz(c0, c1)
  xpdom3(c1, universe, c0, universe)
  syl2anc(((c0 × c1)∈ Fin ∧(c0 × c1)≠ ∅), (c1 × c0)[≅](c0 × c1), c1 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  simprd(((c0 × c1)∈ Fin ∧(c0 × c1)≠ ∅), c1 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  simpld(((c0 × c1)∈ Fin ∧(c0 × c1)≠ ∅), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  xpexr2(c0, c1, cfn)
  xpcomeng(c1, universe, c0, universe)
  domentr(c1, (c1 × c0), (c0 × c1))
  domfi((c0 × c1), c1)
}

blocks.name: ssfid
blocks.content: A subset of a finite set is finite, deduction version of ~ ssfi . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 21-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: infi
blocks.content: The intersection of two sets is finite if one of them is. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Feb-2017.)

blocks.name: rabfi
blocks.content: A restricted class built from a finite set is finite. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Feb-2017.)

blocks.name: finresfin
blocks.content: The restriction of a finite set is finite. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 3-Jan-2018.)

blocks.name: f1finf1o
blocks.content: Any injection from one finite set to another of equal size must be a bijection. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 5-Jun-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm f1finf1o(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wb(wf1(c2, c0, c1), wf1o(c2, c0, c1)))
} = {
  impbid1(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1), wf1o(c2, c0, c1))
  ex(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1), wf1o(c2, c0, c1))
  sylanbrc(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1)), wf1o(c2, c0, c1), wf1(c2, c0, c1), wfo(c2, c0, c1))
  simpr(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1))
  sylanbrc(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1)), wfo(c2, c0, c1), wfn(c2, c0), wceq(crn(c2), c1))
  ffnd(c2, c0, c1, wa(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1)))
  mpd(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1)), wceq(crn(c2), c1), wbr(c0, cen, c1))
  necon4ad(crn(c2), c1, wa(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c1))
  sylbird(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1)), wne(crn(c2), c1), wn(wbr(c0, cen, c1)), wpss(crn(c2), c1))
  syl(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1)), wb(wpss(crn(c2), c1), wne(crn(c2), c1)), wss(crn(c2), c1))
  frnd(c2, c1, c0, wa(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1)))
  baib(wss(crn(c2), c1), wpss(crn(c2), c1), wne(crn(c2), c1))
  df-pss(crn(c2), c1)
  syl6(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1)), wpss(crn(c2), c1), wn(wbr(c0, cen, c1)), wbr(c0, csdm, c1))
  syl6an(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1)), wpss(crn(c2), c1), wbr(c0, csdm, c1), wbr(c0, cen, crn(c2)), wbr(crn(c2), csdm, c1))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, crn(c2)), wcel(c2, co(c1, cmap, c0)), wf1o(c2, c0, crn(c2)))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c1, cmap, c0)), wf(c2, c0, c1))
  adantl(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, c1))
  f1f(c2, c0, c1)
  elmapd(c2, c1, c0, cfn, universe, wa(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1)))
  syl(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1)), wcel(c0, universe), wbr(c0, cen, c1))
  simpll(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn), wf1(c2, c0, c1))
  brrelex1i(c0, cen, c1)
  relen()
  adantl(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1), wf1o(c2, c0, crn(c2)))
  f1f1orn(c2, c0, c1)
  f1oen3g(c2, co(c1, cmap, c0), c0, crn(c2))
  syl(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wf1(c2, c0, c1)), wi(wpss(crn(c2), c1), wbr(crn(c2), csdm, c1)), wcel(c1, cfn))
  simplr(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn), wf1(c2, c0, c1))
  ex(wcel(c1, cfn), wpss(crn(c2), c1), wbr(crn(c2), csdm, c1))
  php3(c1, crn(c2))
  ensdomtr(c0, crn(c2), c1)
  sdomnen(c0, c1)
  df-fo(c2, c0, c1)
  df-f1o(c2, c0, c1)
  f1of1(c2, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm f1finf1o(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)→((c2 : c0 ↣ c1)↔(c2 : c0 ↔ c1)))
} = {
  impbid1((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin), (c2 : c0 ↣ c1), (c2 : c0 ↔ c1))
  ex((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin), (c2 : c0 ↣ c1), (c2 : c0 ↔ c1))
  sylanbrc(((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)∧(c2 : c0 ↣ c1)), (c2 : c0 ↔ c1), (c2 : c0 ↣ c1), (c2 : c0 ↠ c1))
  simpr((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin), (c2 : c0 ↣ c1))
  sylanbrc(((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)∧(c2 : c0 ↣ c1)), (c2 : c0 ↠ c1), c2[Fn]c0, ran(c2)= c1)
  ffnd(c2, c0, c1, ((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)∧(c2 : c0 ↣ c1)))
  mpd(((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)∧(c2 : c0 ↣ c1)), ran(c2)= c1, c0[≅]c1)
  necon4ad(ran(c2), c1, ((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)∧(c2 : c0 ↣ c1)), c0[≅]c1)
  sylbird(((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)∧(c2 : c0 ↣ c1)), ran(c2)≠ c1, ¬ c0[≅]c1, ran(c2)⊊ c1)
  syl(((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)∧(c2 : c0 ↣ c1)), (ran(c2)⊊ c1 ↔ ran(c2)≠ c1), ran(c2)⊆ c1)
  frnd(c2, c1, c0, ((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)∧(c2 : c0 ↣ c1)))
  baib(ran(c2)⊆ c1, ran(c2)⊊ c1, ran(c2)≠ c1)
  df-pss(ran(c2), c1)
  syl6(((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)∧(c2 : c0 ↣ c1)), ran(c2)⊊ c1, ¬ c0[≅]c1, c0[≺]c1)
  syl6an(((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)∧(c2 : c0 ↣ c1)), ran(c2)⊊ c1, c0[≺]c1, c0[≅]ran(c2), ran(c2)[≺]c1)
  syl2anc(((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)∧(c2 : c0 ↣ c1)), c0[≅]ran(c2), c2 ∈(c1[↦]c0), (c2 : c0 ↔ ran(c2)))
  mpbird(((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)∧(c2 : c0 ↣ c1)), c2 ∈(c1[↦]c0), (c2 : c0 → c1))
  adantl((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin), (c2 : c0 ↣ c1), (c2 : c0 → c1))
  f1f(c2, c0, c1)
  elmapd(c2, c1, c0, cfn, universe, ((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)∧(c2 : c0 ↣ c1)))
  syl(((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)∧(c2 : c0 ↣ c1)), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0[≅]c1)
  simpll(c0[≅]c1, c1 ∈ Fin, (c2 : c0 ↣ c1))
  brrelex1i(c0, cen, c1)
  relen()
  adantl((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin), (c2 : c0 ↣ c1), (c2 : c0 ↔ ran(c2)))
  f1f1orn(c2, c0, c1)
  f1oen3g(c2, (c1[↦]c0), c0, ran(c2))
  syl(((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)∧(c2 : c0 ↣ c1)), (ran(c2)⊊ c1 → ran(c2)[≺]c1), c1 ∈ Fin)
  simplr(c0[≅]c1, c1 ∈ Fin, (c2 : c0 ↣ c1))
  ex(c1 ∈ Fin, ran(c2)⊊ c1, ran(c2)[≺]c1)
  php3(c1, ran(c2))
  ensdomtr(c0, ran(c2), c1)
  sdomnen(c0, c1)
  df-fo(c2, c0, c1)
  df-f1o(c2, c0, c1)
  f1of1(c2, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: 0fin
blocks.content: The empty set is finite. (Contributed by FL, 14-Jul-2008.)

blocks.name: nfielex
blocks.content: If a class is not finite, then it contains at least one element. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Jan-2018.)

blocks.name: en1eqsn
blocks.content: A set with one element is a singleton. (Contributed by FL, 18-Aug-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm en1eqsn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c1, cen, c1o)), wceq(c1, csn(c0)))
} = {
  eqcomd(c1, csn(c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c1, cen, c1o)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c1, cen, c1o)), wceq(csn(c0), c1), wcel(c1, cfn), wss(csn(c0), c1), wbr(csn(c0), cen, c1))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c1, cen, c1o), wcel(c1, cfn))
  mpan(wbr(c1, cen, c1o), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c1o, cfn))
  mp2an(wcel(c1o, cfn), wcel(c1o, com), wss(c1o, c1o))
  1onn()
  ssid(c1o)
  ssnnfi(c1o, c1o)
  enfii(c1o, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c1, cen, c1o), wss(csn(c0), c1))
  snssi(c0, c1)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c1, cen, c1o), wbr(csn(c0), cen, c1), wbr(csn(c0), cen, c1o), wbr(c1o, cen, c1))
  ensn1g(c0, c1)
  ensym(c1, c1o)
  entr(csn(c0), c1o, c1)
  fisseneq(c1, csn(c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm en1eqsn(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c1[≅]1o)→ c1 = { c0 })
} = {
  eqcomd(c1, { c0 }, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c1[≅]1o))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c1[≅]1o), { c0 } = c1, c1 ∈ Fin, { c0 } ⊆ c1, { c0 }[≅]c1)
  adantl(c0 ∈ c1, c1[≅]1o, c1 ∈ Fin)
  mpan(c1[≅]1o, c1 ∈ Fin, 1o ∈ Fin)
  mp2an(1o ∈ Fin, 1o ∈ _om, 1o ⊆ 1o)
  1onn()
  ssid(c1o)
  ssnnfi(c1o, c1o)
  enfii(c1o, c1)
  adantr(c0 ∈ c1, c1[≅]1o, { c0 } ⊆ c1)
  snssi(c0, c1)
  syl2an(c0 ∈ c1, c1[≅]1o, { c0 }[≅]c1, { c0 }[≅]1o, 1o[≅]c1)
  ensn1g(c0, c1)
  ensym(c1, c1o)
  entr({ c0 }, c1o, c1)
  fisseneq(c1, { c0 })
}

blocks.name: en1eqsnbi
blocks.content: A set containing an element has exactly one element iff it is a singleton. Formerly part of proof for ~ rngen1zr . (Contributed by FL, 13-Feb-2010.) (Revised by AV, 25-Jan-2020.)

blocks.name: diffi
blocks.content: If ` A ` is finite, ` ( A \ B ) ` is finite. (Contributed by FL, 3-Aug-2009.)

blocks.name: dif1en
blocks.content: If a set ` A ` is equinumerous to the successor of a natural number ` M ` , then ` A ` with an element removed is equinumerous to ` M ` . (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Aug-2015.)

thm enp1ilem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wceq(cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), c1), wceq(c0, c2)))

} = {
  syl5ib(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), c1), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cun(c0, csn(cv(s0))), c2))
  3eqtr3g(cun(c0, csn(cv(s0))), c2, cun(cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(s0))), cun(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), c1))
  uneq1(cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), c1, csn(cv(s0)))
  undif1(c0, csn(cv(s0)))
  eqtr4i(cun(c1, csn(cv(s0))), c2, cun(csn(cv(s0)), c1))
  uncom(c1, csn(cv(s0)))
  eqeq1d(cun(c0, csn(cv(s0))), c2, c0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sylib(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cun(c0, csn(cv(s0))), c0), wss(csn(cv(s0)), c0))
  snssi(cv(s0), c0)
  ssequn2(csn(cv(s0)), c0)
}

blocks.origin:
thm enp1i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wex(s0, w0))
  -| wcel(c2, com)
  -| wceq(c1, csuc(c2))
  -| wi(wbr(cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cen, c2), w1)
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpd(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wex(s0, w0), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  sylib(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wn(wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  con2i(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  mpi(wceq(c0, emptycls), wn(wbr(c0, cen, c1)), wne(csuc(c2), emptycls))
  nsuceq0(c2)
  necon3ad(csuc(c2), emptycls, wceq(c0, emptycls), wbr(c0, cen, c1))
  syl6bi(wceq(c0, emptycls), wbr(c0, cen, c1), wceq(csuc(c2), emptycls), wbr(emptycls, cen, c1))
  breq1(c0, emptycls, cen, c1)
  syl5eqr(csuc(c2), emptycls, c1, wbr(emptycls, cen, c1))
  sylib(wbr(emptycls, cen, c1), wceq(c1, emptycls), wbr(c1, cen, emptycls))
  ensym(emptycls, c1)
  en0(c1)
  neq0(s0, c0)
  eximdv(s0, wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  sylcom(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0, w1)
  sylbi(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1), wbr(c0, cen, csuc(c2)))
  breq2i(c0, cen, c1, csuc(c2))
  ex(wbr(c0, cen, csuc(c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)
  syl(wa(wbr(c0, cen, csuc(c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1, wbr(cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cen, c2))
  mp3an1(wbr(c0, cen, csuc(c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cen, c2), wcel(c2, com))
  dif1en(c2, c0, cv(s0))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cen, c1)
  diff.cen.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm enp1i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (c0[≅]c1 → ∃(s0, w0))
  ⊣ c2 ∈ _om
  ⊣ c1 = suc(c2)
  ⊣ ((c0 \ { s0 })[≅]c2 → w1)
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ c0 →(w1 → w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpd(c0[≅]c1, ∃(s0, w0), ∃(s0, s0 ∈ c0))
  sylib(c0[≅]c1, ∃(s0, s0 ∈ c0), ¬ c0 = ∅)
  con2i(c0[≅]c1, c0 = ∅)
  mpi(c0 = ∅, ¬ c0[≅]c1, suc(c2)≠ ∅)
  nsuceq0(c2)
  necon3ad(suc(c2), emptycls, c0 = ∅, c0[≅]c1)
  syl6bi(c0 = ∅, c0[≅]c1, suc(c2)= ∅, ∅[≅]c1)
  breq1(c0, emptycls, cen, c1)
  syl5eqr(suc(c2), emptycls, c1, ∅[≅]c1)
  sylib(∅[≅]c1, c1 = ∅, c1[≅]∅)
  ensym(emptycls, c1)
  en0(c1)
  neq0(s0, c0)
  eximdv(s0, c0[≅]c1, s0 ∈ c0, w0)
  sylcom(c0[≅]c1, s0 ∈ c0, w0, w1)
  sylbi(c0[≅]c1, (s0 ∈ c0 → w1), c0[≅]suc(c2))
  breq2i(c0, cen, c1, suc(c2))
  ex(c0[≅]suc(c2), s0 ∈ c0, w1)
  syl((c0[≅]suc(c2)∧ s0 ∈ c0), w1, (c0 \ { s0 })[≅]c2)
  mp3an1(c0[≅]suc(c2), s0 ∈ c0, (c0 \ { s0 })[≅]c2, c2 ∈ _om)
  dif1en(c2, c0, s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cen, c1)
  diff.cen.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: en2
blocks.content: A set equinumerous to ordinal 2 is a pair. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jan-2016.)

thm en2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cen, c2o), wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  enp1i(s0, c0, c2o, c1o, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wex(s1, wceq(cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(s1)))))
  1onn()
  df-2o()
  biimpi(wbr(cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cen, c1o), wex(s1, wceq(cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(s1)))))
  en1(s1, cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))))
  eximdv(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(s1))), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  enp1ilem(s0, c0, csn(cv(s1)), cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  df-pr(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.c2o.s(s0)
  diff.cdif.s(s1, c0, csn(cv(s0)))
  diff.csn.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm en2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0[≅]2o → ∃(s0, ∃(s1, c0 = { s0, s1 })))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  enp1i(s0, c0, c2o, c1o, ∃(s1, c0 = { s0, s1 }), ∃(s1,(c0 \ { s0 })= { s1 }))
  1onn()
  df-2o()
  biimpi((c0 \ { s0 })[≅]1o, ∃(s1,(c0 \ { s0 })= { s1 }))
  en1(s1, (c0 \ { s0 }))
  eximdv(s1, s0 ∈ c0, (c0 \ { s0 })= { s1 }, c0 = { s0, s1 })

  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)

}

blocks.name: findcard
blocks.content: Schema for induction on the cardinality of a finite set. The inductive hypothesis is that the result is true on the given set with any one element removed. The result is then proven to be true for all finite sets. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm findcard(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cdif(cv(s1), csn(cv(s2)))), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| w2
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s1), cfn), wi(wral(s2, cv(s1), w3), w4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfn), w0), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfn), w0), diffsc(s2, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfn), w0), diffsw(s0, w2))
  vtoclga(s0, c0, cfn, w0, w1)
  sylbi(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), w1, wrex(hs0, com, wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0))))
  isfi(hs0, cv(s0))
  rexlimiv(hs0, com, wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0)), w1)
  19.21bi(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), com), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0)), w1))
  finds1(hs0, hs1, wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0)), w1)), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, emptycls), w1)), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)), w1)), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), w1)))
  albidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0)), w1), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, emptycls), w1))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0)), w1, wbr(cv(s0), cen, emptycls))
  breq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(s0), cen)
  albidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0)), w1), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)), w1))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0)), w1, wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(s0), cen)
  albidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0)), w1), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), w1))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0)), w1, wbr(cv(s0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))))
  breq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), cv(s0), cen)
  ax-gen(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, emptycls), w1))
  sylbi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, emptycls), w1, wceq(cv(s0), emptycls))
  en0(cv(s0))
  mpbiri(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), w1, w2)
  syl6ibr(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)), w1)), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), w1)), wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), w4)))
  alrimdv(s1, wcel(cv(hs1), com), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)), w1)), wi(wbr(cv(s1), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), w4))
  3exp(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)), w1)), wbr(cv(s1), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), w4)
  sylc(w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)), w1)), wbr(cv(s1), cen, csuc(cv(hs1)))), w4, wcel(cv(s1), cfn), wral(s2, cv(s1), w3))
  3adant2(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)), w1)), wbr(cv(s1), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(s1), cfn))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wbr(cv(s1), cen, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(s1), cfn), wrex(hs0, com, wbr(cv(s1), cen, cv(hs0))))
  sylan(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wbr(cv(s1), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), wrex(hs0, com, wbr(cv(s1), cen, cv(hs0))), wcel(csuc(cv(hs1)), com))
  peano2(cv(hs1))
  rspcev(hs0, csuc(cv(hs1)), com, wbr(cv(s1), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(s1), cen, cv(hs0)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), cv(s1), cen)
  isfi(hs0, cv(s1))
  3impa(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)), w1)), wbr(cv(s1), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), wral(s2, cv(s1), w3))
  an32s(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)), w1)), wbr(cv(s1), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), wral(s2, cv(s1), w3))
  imp(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wbr(cv(s1), cen, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)), w1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), w3))
  ralrimdva(s2, cv(s1), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wbr(cv(s1), cen, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)), w1)), w3)

thm findcard(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Fin → w0)
  ⊣ (s0 = ∅ →(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s0 =(s1 \ { s2 })→(w1 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w1 ↔ w4))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ w2
  ⊣ (s1 ∈ Fin →(∀(s2 ∈ s1, w3)→ w4))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w4)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
  ⊣ d(s2, w1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ Fin → w0), d(s1, c0))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ Fin → w0), d(s2, c0))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ Fin → w0), d(s0, w2))
  vtoclga(s0, c0, cfn, w0, w1)
  sylbi(s0 ∈ Fin, w1, ∃(hs0 ∈ _om, s0[≅]hs0))
  isfi(hs0, s0)
  rexlimiv(hs0, com, s0[≅]hs0, w1)
  19.21bi(s0, hs0 ∈ _om, (s0[≅]hs0 → w1))
  finds1(hs0, hs1, ∀(s0,(s0[≅]hs0 → w1)), ∀(s0,(s0[≅]∅ → w1)), ∀(s0,(s0[≅]hs1 → w1)), ∀(s0,(s0[≅]suc(hs1)→ w1)))
  albidv(s0, hs0 = ∅, (s0[≅]hs0 → w1), (s0[≅]∅ → w1))
  imbi1d(hs0 = ∅, s0[≅]hs0, w1, s0[≅]∅)
  breq2(hs0, emptycls, s0, cen)
  albidv(s0, hs0 = hs1, (s0[≅]hs0 → w1), (s0[≅]hs1 → w1))
  imbi1d(hs0 = hs1, s0[≅]hs0, w1, s0[≅]hs1)
  breq2(hs0, hs1, s0, cen)
  albidv(s0, hs0 = suc(hs1), (s0[≅]hs0 → w1), (s0[≅]suc(hs1)→ w1))
  imbi1d(hs0 = suc(hs1), s0[≅]hs0, w1, s0[≅]suc(hs1))
  breq2(hs0, suc(hs1), s0, cen)
  ax-gen(s0, (s0[≅]∅ → w1))
  sylbi(s0[≅]∅, w1, s0 = ∅)
  en0(s0)
  mpbiri(s0 = ∅, w1, w2)
  syl6ibr(hs1 ∈ _om, ∀(s0,(s0[≅]hs1 → w1)), ∀(s0,(s0[≅]suc(hs1)→ w1)), ∀(s1,(s1[≅]suc(hs1)→ w4)))
  alrimdv(s1, hs1 ∈ _om, ∀(s0,(s0[≅]hs1 → w1)), (s1[≅]suc(hs1)→ w4))
  3exp(hs1 ∈ _om, ∀(s0,(s0[≅]hs1 → w1)), s1[≅]suc(hs1), w4)
  sylc((hs1 ∈ _om ∧ ∀(s0,(s0[≅]hs1 → w1))∧ s1[≅]suc(hs1)), w4, s1 ∈ Fin, ∀(s2 ∈ s1, w3))
  3adant2(hs1 ∈ _om, ∀(s0,(s0[≅]hs1 → w1)), s1[≅]suc(hs1), s1 ∈ Fin)
  sylibr((hs1 ∈ _om ∧ s1[≅]suc(hs1)), s1 ∈ Fin, ∃(hs0 ∈ _om, s1[≅]hs0))
  sylan(hs1 ∈ _om, s1[≅]suc(hs1), ∃(hs0 ∈ _om, s1[≅]hs0), suc(hs1)∈ _om)
  peano2(hs1)
  rspcev(hs0, suc(hs1), com, s1[≅]suc(hs1), s1[≅]hs0)
  breq2(hs0, suc(hs1), s1, cen)
  isfi(hs0, s1)
  3impa(hs1 ∈ _om, ∀(s0,(s0[≅]hs1 → w1)), s1[≅]suc(hs1), ∀(s2 ∈ s1, w3))
  an32s(hs1 ∈ _om, ∀(s0,(s0[≅]hs1 → w1)), s1[≅]suc(hs1), ∀(s2 ∈ s1, w3))
  imp((hs1 ∈ _om ∧ s1[≅]suc(hs1)), ∀(s0,(s0[≅]hs1 → w1)), ∀(s2 ∈ s1, w3))
  ralrimdva(s2, s1, (hs1 ∈ _om ∧ s1[≅]suc(hs1)), ∀(s0,(s0[≅]hs1 → w1)), w3)
  syl5com(((hs1 ∈ _om ∧ s1[≅]suc(hs1))∧ s2 ∈ s1), ∀(s0,(s0[≅]hs1 → w1)), w3, (s1 \ { s2 })[≅]hs1)
  3expa(hs1 ∈ _om, s1[≅]suc(hs1), s2 ∈ s1, (s1 \ { s2 })[≅]hs1)
  dif1en(hs1, s1, s2)
  spcv(s0, (s1 \ { s2 }), (s0[≅]hs1 → w1), ((s1 \ { s2 })[≅]hs1 → w3))
  difexi(s1, { s2 })
  vex(s1)
  imbi12d(s0 =(s1 \ { s2 }), s0[≅]hs1, w1, (s1 \ { s2 })[≅]hs1, w3)
  breq1(s0, (s1 \ { s2 }), cen, hs1)
  cbvalvw(s0, s1, (s0[≅]suc(hs1)→ w1), (s1[≅]suc(hs1)→ w4))
  imbi12d(s0 = s1, s0[≅]suc(hs1), w1, s1[≅]suc(hs1), w4)
  breq1(s0, s1, cen, suc(hs1))
  diff.cfn.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0,(s0[≅]∅ → w1)))
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0,(s0[≅]hs1 → w1)))
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0,(s0[≅]suc(hs1)→ w1)))
  diff.hs1.w(∀(s0,(s0[≅]hs0 → w1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, suc(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs1, com)
  diff.com.s(s1)
  diff.wal.s(s1, s0, (s0[≅]hs1 → w1))
  diff.wi.s(s1, s0[≅]hs1, w1)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, s0, cen, hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(suc(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w(s1[≅]suc(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, hs1 ∈ _om, s1[≅]suc(hs1))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, hs1, com)
  diff.com.s(s2)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, s1, cen, suc(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.csuc.s(s2, hs1)
  diff.wal.s(s2, s0, (s0[≅]hs1 → w1))
  diff.wi.s(s2, s0[≅]hs1, w1)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, s0, cen, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cen.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.wi.s(s0, (s1 \ { s2 })[≅]hs1, w3)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, (s1 \ { s2 }), cen, hs1)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, s1, { s2 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wi.s(s0, s1[≅]suc(hs1), w4)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, s1, cen, suc(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cen.s(s0)
  diff.csuc.s(s0, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wi.s(s1, s0[≅]suc(hs1), w1)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, s0, cen, suc(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cen.s(s1)
  diff.csuc.s(s1, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: findcard2
blocks.content: Schema for induction on the cardinality of a finite set. The inductive step shows that the result is true if one more element is added to the set. The result is then proven to be true for all finite sets. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 8-Jul-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm findcard2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cun(cv(s1), csn(cv(s2)))), wb(w1, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| w2
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s1), cfn), wi(w3, w4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfn), w0), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfn), w0), diffsc(s2, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfn), w0), diffsw(s0, w2))
  vtoclga(s0, c0, cfn, w0, w1)
  sylbi(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), w1, wrex(hs0, com, wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0))))
  isfi(hs0, cv(s0))
  rexlimiv(hs0, com, wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0)), w1)
  19.21bi(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), com), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0)), w1))
  finds1(hs0, hs1, wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0)), w1)), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, emptycls), w1)), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)), w1)), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), w1)))
  albidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0)), w1), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, emptycls), w1))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0)), w1, wbr(cv(s0), cen, emptycls))
  breq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(s0), cen)
  albidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0)), w1), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)), w1))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0)), w1, wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(s0), cen)
  albidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0)), w1), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), w1))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs0)), w1, wbr(cv(s0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))))
  breq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), cv(s0), cen)
  ax-gen(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, emptycls), w1))
  sylbi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, emptycls), w1, wceq(cv(s0), emptycls))
  en0(cv(s0))
  mpbiri(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), w1, w2)
  syl6ibr(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)), w1)), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), w1)), wal(hs0, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w1))))
  alrimdv(hs0, wcel(cv(hs1), com), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)), w1)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w1)))
  com23(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)), w1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w1))
  mpdd(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), wi(wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)), w1)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w1)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  ex(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  mpi(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wne(csuc(cv(hs1)), emptycls))
  nsuceq0(cv(hs1))
  necon3d(csuc(cv(hs1)), emptycls, cv(hs0), emptycls, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1)))))
  com12(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(csuc(cv(hs1)), emptycls))
  syl6bi(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wceq(csuc(cv(hs1)), emptycls), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wbr(emptycls, cen, csuc(cv(hs1)))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs1), com), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), wbr(emptycls, cen, csuc(cv(hs1))))
  breq1(cv(hs0), emptycls, cen, csuc(cv(hs1)))
  eqcomd(csuc(cv(hs1)), emptycls, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wbr(emptycls, cen, csuc(cv(hs1)))))
  biimpa(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wbr(emptycls, cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), wceq(emptycls, csuc(cv(hs1))))
  sylancr(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wb(wbr(emptycls, cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), wceq(emptycls, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wcel(emptycls, com), wcel(csuc(cv(hs1)), com))
  peano1()
  peano2(cv(hs1))
  nneneq(emptycls, csuc(cv(hs1)))
  ex(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), wi(wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wi(wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)), w1)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w1))))
  syl5bi(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), com), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wi(wal(s0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(hs1)), w1)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w1)), wex(s2, wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0))))

blocks.name: findcard2s
blocks.content: Variation of ~ findcard2 requiring that the element added in the induction step not be a member of the original set. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 30-Nov-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm findcard2s(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cun(cv(s1), csn(cv(s2)))), wb(w1, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| w2
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cfn), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))), wi(w3, w4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
} = {
  findcard2(s0, s1, s2, c0, w0, w1, w2, w3, w4)
  pm2.61d2(wcel(cv(s1), cfn), wi(w3, w4), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))
  ex(wcel(cv(s1), cfn), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wi(w3, w4))
  biimpd(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w3, w4)
  syl(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wb(w3, w4), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cun(cv(s1), csn(cv(s2)))))))
  sylib(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cun(cv(s1), csn(cv(s2)))))), wceq(cv(s1), cun(cv(s1), csn(cv(s2)))))
  syl5reqr(cv(s1), cun(cv(s1), csn(cv(s2))), cun(csn(cv(s2)), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))
  uncom(csn(cv(s2)), cv(s1))
  sylib(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(cun(csn(cv(s2)), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wss(csn(cv(s2)), cv(s1)))
  snssi(cv(s2), cv(s1))
  ssequn1(csn(cv(s2)), cv(s1))
  eqvinc(s0, cv(s1), cun(cv(s1), csn(cv(s2))))
  vex(s1)
  exlimiv(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cun(cv(s1), csn(cv(s2))))), wb(w3, w4))
  sylan9bb(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cun(cv(s1), csn(cv(s2)))), w3, w4, w1)
  bicomd(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w3, w1)
  diff.cun.s(s0, cv(s1), csn(cv(s2)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wb.s(s0, w3, w4)
}

thm findcard2s(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Fin → w0)
  ⊣ (s0 = ∅ →(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w1 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s0 =(s1 ⋃ { s2 })→(w1 ↔ w4))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ w2
  ⊣ ((s1 ∈ Fin ∧ ¬ s2 ∈ s1)→(w3 → w4))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w4)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
  ⊣ d(s2, w1)
} = {
  findcard2(s0, s1, s2, c0, w0, w1, w2, w3, w4)
  pm2.61d2(s1 ∈ Fin, (w3 → w4), s2 ∈ s1)
  ex(s1 ∈ Fin, ¬ s2 ∈ s1, (w3 → w4))
  biimpd(s2 ∈ s1, w3, w4)
  syl(s2 ∈ s1, (w3 ↔ w4), ∃(s0,(s0 = s1 ∧ s0 =(s1 ⋃ { s2 }))))
  sylib(s2 ∈ s1, ∃(s0,(s0 = s1 ∧ s0 =(s1 ⋃ { s2 }))), s1 =(s1 ⋃ { s2 }))
  syl5reqr(s1, (s1 ⋃ { s2 }), ({ s2 } ⋃ s1), s2 ∈ s1)
  uncom({ s2 }, s1)
  sylib(s2 ∈ s1, ({ s2 } ⋃ s1)= s1, { s2 } ⊆ s1)
  snssi(s2, s1)
  ssequn1({ s2 }, s1)
  eqvinc(s0, s1, (s1 ⋃ { s2 }))
  vex(s1)
  exlimiv(s0, (s0 = s1 ∧ s0 =(s1 ⋃ { s2 })), (w3 ↔ w4))
  sylan9bb(s0 = s1, s0 =(s1 ⋃ { s2 }), w3, w4, w1)
  bicomd(s0 = s1, w3, w1)
  diff.cun.s(s0, s1, { s2 })
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wb.s(s0, w3, w4)
}

  sseq1(cv(s0), cun(cv(s1), csn(cv(s2))), c0)

thm findcard2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  ⊢ (w0 → w1)
  ⊣ (s0 = ∅ →(w2 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w2 ↔ w4))
  ⊣ (s0 =(s1 ⋃ { s2 })→(w2 ↔ w5))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w2 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (w0 → w3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ s2 ∈(c0 \ s1)))→(w4 → w5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w5)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w2)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w2)
} = {
  mpan2(w0, w1, c0 ⊆ c0)
  ssid(c0)
  mpcom((w0 ∧ c0 ⊆ c0), w1, c0 ∈ Fin)
  adantr(w0, c0 ⊆ c0, c0 ∈ Fin)

blocks.name: findcard3
blocks.content: Schema for strong induction on the cardinality of a finite set. The inductive hypothesis is that the result is true on any proper subset. The result is then proven to be true for all finite sets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: ac6sfi
blocks.content: A version of ~ ac6s for finite sets. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 26-Jun-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jan-2014.)

thm ac6sfi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {

  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wex(s2, wa(wf(cv(s2), c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, w1))))

  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wex(s2, wa(wf(cv(s2), cv(hs0), c1), wral(s0, cv(hs0), w1))), wral(s0, emptycls, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wex(s2, wa(wf(cv(s2), emptycls, c1), wral(s0, emptycls, w1))))

  feq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(s2), c1)

  raleq(s0, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), wrex(s1, c1, w0))
  exbidv(s2, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wf(cv(s2), cv(hs0), c1), wral(s0, cv(hs0), w1)), wa(wf(cv(s2), cv(hs1), c1), wral(s0, cv(hs1), w1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wf(cv(s2), cv(hs0), c1), wral(s0, cv(hs0), w1), wf(cv(s2), cv(hs1), c1), wral(s0, cv(hs1), w1))
  feq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(s2), c1)

blocks.name: frfi
blocks.content: A partial order is well-founded on a finite set. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 18-Jun-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  ⊢ ((c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)→ c0[Fr]c1)

  impcom(c0 ⪯ c1, c1 ∈ Fin, c0[Fr]c1)
  findcard2(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, (c0 ⪯ c1 → c0[Fr]c1), (c0 ⪯ hs0 → c0[Fr]hs0), (c0 ⪯ ∅ → c0[Fr]∅), (c0 ⪯ hs1 → c0[Fr]hs1), (c0 ⪯(hs1 ⋃ { hs2 })→ c0[Fr](hs1 ⋃ { hs2 })))
  imbi12d(hs0 = ∅, c0 ⪯ hs0, c0[Fr]hs0, c0 ⪯ ∅, c0[Fr]∅)
  poeq2(hs0, emptycls, c0)
  freq2(hs0, emptycls, c0)
  imbi12d(hs0 = hs1, c0 ⪯ hs0, c0[Fr]hs0, c0 ⪯ hs1, c0[Fr]hs1)

blocks.name: fimax2g
blocks.content: A finite set has a maximum under a total order. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 18-Jun-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  |- wi(w3a(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  mpd(w3a(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))), wfr(ccnv(c0), c1))

  an32s(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls), wfr(ccnv(c0), c1), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0))))))
  mpanr1(wa(wcel(c1, cfn), wfr(ccnv(c0), c1)), wne(c1, emptycls), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0))))), wss(c1, c1))
  ssid(c1)
  fri(s0, s1, c1, cfn, ccnv(c0), c1)
  rexbii(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  ralbii(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  notbii(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  brcnv(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))
  vex(s1)
  vex(s0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
}

blocks.name: fimaxg
blocks.content: A finite set has a maximum under a total order. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fimaxg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  mpbird(w3a(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))))
  fimax2g(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  3ad2ant1(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls), wb(wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))))
  rexbidva(s0, c1, wor(c0, c1), wral(s1, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  ralbidva(s1, c1, wa(wor(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  anassrs(wor(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wb(wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  syl5bb(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  bitri(wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  imbi1i(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  df-ne(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  pm4.64(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  con2bid(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  sotric(c0, c1, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.wor.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wor(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  diff.wor.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: fisupg
blocks.content: Lemma showing existence and closure of supremum of a finite set. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm fisupg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  mpd(w3a(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  fimaxg(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  3ad2ant1(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls), wi(wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))))))
  reximdva(s0, c1, wor(c0, c1), wral(s1, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))))
  jctird(wa(wor(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wral(s1, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))
  ralimdva(s1, c1, wa(wor(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  pm2.61dne(cv(s0), cv(s1), wa(wa(wor(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  a1dd(wa(wa(wor(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  anassrs(wor(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  ex(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  simprbda(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  sotrieq2(c0, c1, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  syl9r(wa(wa(wor(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  pm2.27(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  anassrs(wor(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  syl5com(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wn(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  so2nr(c0, c1, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  con3d(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  pm3.21(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  adantl(wor(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))
  ralrimivw(s1, c1, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))
  ex(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))
  rspcev(s2, cv(s0), c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))
  breq2(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1), c0)
  diff.wor.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wor(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  diff.wor.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

blocks.name: wofi
blocks.content: A total order on a finite set is a well-order. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 18-Jun-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jan-2014.)

blocks.name: ordunifi
blocks.content: The maximum of a finite collection of ordinals is in the set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ordunifi(class c0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, con0), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cuni(c0), c0))
} = {
  syl(w3a(wss(c0, con0), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cuni(c0), c0), wrex(hs0, c0, wss(cuni(c0), cv(hs0))))
  mpbid(w3a(wss(c0, con0), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(hs0, c0, wss(cuni(c0), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1))))))
  syl3an1(wss(c0, con0), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1))))), wor(cep, c0))
  mpi(wss(c0, con0), wor(cep, c0), wor(cep, con0))
  ax-mp(wor(cep, con0), wwe(cep, con0))
  epweon()
  weso(cep, con0)
  soss(c0, con0, cep)
  fimax2g(hs0, hs1, cep, c0)
  3ad2ant1(wss(c0, con0), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wrex(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1))))), wrex(hs0, c0, wss(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)))))
  rexbidva(hs0, c0, wss(c0, con0), wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1)))), wss(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)))
  syl6bbr(wa(wss(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1)))), wss(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), wral(hs1, c0, wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  ralbidva(hs1, c0, wa(wss(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1))), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wss(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wb(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1))), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  adantlr(wss(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), con0))
  ssel2(c0, con0, cv(hs1))
  adantr(wa(wss(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  ssel2(c0, con0, cv(hs0))
  syl6rbbr(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), con0)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1))), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  ontri1(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  notbii(wbr(cv(hs0), cep, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  epel(hs1, cv(hs0))
  unissb(hs1, c0, cv(hs0))
  rexlimiv(hs0, c0, wss(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cuni(c0), c0))
  mpand(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cuni(c0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)))
  elssuni(cv(hs0), c0)
  syl5bir(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)), wss(cuni(c0), cv(hs0))), wcel(cuni(c0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)))
  eqss(cv(hs0), cuni(c0))
  biimpcd(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)), wcel(cuni(c0), c0))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cuni(c0), c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cep)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cep)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c0, con0))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wss(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cuni(c0), c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ordunifi(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ On ∧ c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c0 ≠ ∅)→ ⋃ c0 ∈ c0)
} = {
  syl((c0 ⊆ On ∧ c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c0 ≠ ∅), ⋃ c0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ⋃ c0 ⊆ hs0))
  mpbid((c0 ⊆ On ∧ c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c0 ≠ ∅), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ⋃ c0 ⊆ hs0), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[∈]hs1)))
  syl3an1(c0 ⊆ On, c0 ∈ Fin, c0 ≠ ∅, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[∈]hs1)), ∈ ≺ c0)
  mpi(c0 ⊆ On, ∈ ≺ c0, ∈ ≺ On)
  ax-mp(∈ ≺ On, ∈ ≤ On)
  epweon()
  weso(cep, con0)
  soss(c0, con0, cep)
  fimax2g(hs0, hs1, cep, c0)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ⊆ On, c0 ∈ Fin, c0 ≠ ∅, (∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[∈]hs1))↔ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ⋃ c0 ⊆ hs0)))
  rexbidva(hs0, c0, c0 ⊆ On, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[∈]hs1), ⋃ c0 ⊆ hs0)
  syl6bbr((c0 ⊆ On ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[∈]hs1), ⋃ c0 ⊆ hs0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1 ⊆ hs0))
  ralbidva(hs1, c0, (c0 ⊆ On ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), ¬ hs0[∈]hs1, hs1 ⊆ hs0)
  syl2anc(((c0 ⊆ On ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)∧ hs1 ∈ c0), (¬ hs0[∈]hs1 ↔ hs1 ⊆ hs0), hs1 ∈ On, hs0 ∈ On)
  adantlr(c0 ⊆ On, hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ On)
  ssel2(c0, con0, hs1)
  adantr((c0 ⊆ On ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ On)
  ssel2(c0, con0, hs0)
  syl6rbbr((hs1 ∈ On ∧ hs0 ∈ On), ¬ hs0[∈]hs1, hs1 ⊆ hs0, ¬ hs0 ∈ hs1)
  ontri1(hs1, hs0)
  notbii(hs0[∈]hs1, hs0 ∈ hs1)
  epel(hs1, hs0)
  unissb(hs1, c0, hs0)
  rexlimiv(hs0, c0, ⋃ c0 ⊆ hs0, ⋃ c0 ∈ c0)
  mpand(hs0 ∈ c0, ⋃ c0 ⊆ hs0, ⋃ c0 ∈ c0, hs0 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  elssuni(hs0, c0)
  syl5bir(hs0 ∈ c0, (hs0 ⊆ ⋃ c0 ∧ ⋃ c0 ⊆ hs0), ⋃ c0 ∈ c0, hs0 = ⋃ c0)
  eqss(hs0, ⋃ c0)
  biimpcd(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 = ⋃ c0, ⋃ c0 ∈ c0)
  eleq1(hs0, ⋃ c0, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cep)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cep)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ⊆ On)
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ⊆ On ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(⋃ c0 ∈ c0)
}

blocks.name: nnunifi
blocks.content: The union (supremum) of a finite set of finite ordinals is a finite ordinal. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnunifi(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, com), wcel(c0, cfn)), wcel(cuni(c0), com))
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c0, emptycls, wa(wss(c0, com), wcel(c0, cfn)), wcel(cuni(c0), com))
  adantl(wa(wss(c0, com), wcel(c0, cfn)), wceq(c0, emptycls), wcel(cuni(c0), com))
  syl6eqel(cuni(c0), com, cuni(emptycls), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  unieq(c0, emptycls)
  eqeltri(cuni(emptycls), com, emptycls)
  uni0()
  peano1()
  sseldd(cuni(c0), com, c0, wa(wa(wss(c0, com), wcel(c0, cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wss(c0, com), wcel(c0, cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cuni(c0), c0), wss(c0, con0), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls))
  syl6ss(c0, con0, com, wa(wa(wss(c0, com), wcel(c0, cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls)))
  simpll(wss(c0, com), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls))
  omsson()
  simplr(wss(c0, com), wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls))
  simpr(wa(wss(c0, com), wcel(c0, cfn)), wne(c0, emptycls))
  ordunifi(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nnunifi(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ _om ∧ c0 ∈ Fin)→ ⋃ c0 ∈ _om)
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c0, emptycls, (c0 ⊆ _om ∧ c0 ∈ Fin), ⋃ c0 ∈ _om)
  adantl((c0 ⊆ _om ∧ c0 ∈ Fin), c0 = ∅, ⋃ c0 ∈ _om)
  syl6eqel(⋃ c0, com, ⋃ ∅, c0 = ∅)
  unieq(c0, emptycls)
  eqeltri(⋃ ∅, com, emptycls)
  uni0()

thm unblem3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, com), wral(s0, com, wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wi(wcel(cv(s2), com), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cfv(c1, csuc(cv(s2))))))

  ex(wa(wss(c0, com), wral(s0, com, wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s2), com), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cfv(c1, csuc(cv(s2)))))

  syl(wa(wa(wss(c0, com), wral(s0, com, wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s2), com)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cint(cdif(c0, csuc(cfv(c1, cv(s2)))))), wa(wss(c0, con0), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), con0)))
  mpd(wa(wa(wss(c0, com), wral(s0, com, wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s2), com)), wa(wss(c0, con0), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), con0)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), c0))

  sstr(c0, com, con0)

  sylcom(wa(wss(c0, com), wral(s0, com, wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s2), com), wceq(cfv(c1, csuc(cv(s2))), cint(cdif(c0, csuc(cfv(c1, cv(s2)))))), wcel(cint(cdif(c0, csuc(cfv(c1, cv(s2))))), c0))
  syld(wa(wss(c0, com), wral(s0, com, wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s2), com), wcel(cint(cdif(c0, csuc(cfv(c1, cv(s2))))), c0), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), c0))
  unblem2(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1)

  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ _om ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ _om, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ s1)))→(s2 ∈ _om →(c1 ` s2)∈(c1 ` suc(s2))))

} = {
  ex((c0 ⊆ _om ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ _om, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ s1))), s2 ∈ _om, (c1 ` s2)∈(c1 ` suc(s2)))

  syl(((c0 ⊆ _om ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ _om, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ s1)))∧ s2 ∈ _om), (c1 ` s2)∈ ⋂(c0 \ suc((c1 ` s2))), (c0 ⊆ On ∧(c1 ` s2)∈ On))
  mpd(((c0 ⊆ _om ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ _om, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ s1)))∧ s2 ∈ _om), (c0 ⊆ On ∧(c1 ` s2)∈ On), (c1 ` s2)∈ c0)
  imp((c0 ⊆ _om ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ _om, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ s1))), s2 ∈ _om, (c1 ` s2)∈ c0)
  ad2antrr(c0 ⊆ _om, ∀(s0 ∈ _om, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ s1)), s2 ∈ _om, ((c1 ` s2)∈ c0 →(c0 ⊆ On ∧(c1 ` s2)∈ On)))
  syl(c0 ⊆ _om, ((c1 ` s2)∈ c0 →(c0 ⊆ On ∧(c1 ` s2)∈ On)), c0 ⊆ On)

  imp((c0 ⊆ _om ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ _om, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ s1))), s2 ∈ _om, (c1 ` suc(s2))= ⋂(c0 \ suc((c1 ` s2))))
  sylcom((c0 ⊆ _om ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ _om, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ s1))), s2 ∈ _om, (c1 ` suc(s2))= ⋂(c0 \ suc((c1 ` s2))), ⋂(c0 \ suc((c1 ` s2)))∈ c0)

  ex(s2 ∈ _om, ⋂(c0 \ suc((c1 ` s2)))∈ c0, (c1 ` suc(s2))= ⋂(c0 \ suc((c1 ` s2))))
  frsucmpt2(s3, hs0, s2, ⋂(c0 \ suc((c1 ` s2))), c0, c1, ⋂(c0 \ suc(s3)), ⋂ c0, ⋂(c0 \ suc(hs0)))
